title: FDI NEIR
description: The Federal Directorate of Immunization (FDI) - National Electronic Immunization Registry (NEIR) is an Android-based application designed to revolutionize vaccination data management and support public health initiatives. This application empowers healthcare professionals to register and record child vaccination data in real time using unique Quick Response (QR) codes. NEIR ensures a server-based, persistent electronic record that facilitates precise tracking of child vaccination coverage and supports disease prevention efforts. Clinical decision support The app includes an electronic decision support system that guides routine and catch-up immunizations, enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of vaccination efforts. Disease prevention and public health The app supports national immunization campaigns and tracks child vaccination data in real-time using unique QR codes. It maintains comprehensive vaccination records and facilitates precise tracking of child vaccination coverage. Healthcare services and management: The app facilitates vaccinator management, attendance tracking, micro-planning, surveillance forms, and vaccine stock maintenance. It also provides comprehensive reporting, PDF report downloads, and SMS reminders for upcoming immunization visits. Key features of FDI NEIR include: Immunization Campaign and Data Support: Supports national immunization campaigns and data management strategies by maintaining comprehensive vaccination records and providing decision support to health workers. Real-time Data Recording: Allows vaccinators to instantly log vaccination data against unique QR codes, ensuring accurate and up-to-date records. Electronic Decision Support System: Guides routine and catch-up immunizations, enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of vaccination efforts. Comprehensive Reporting:The web-based dashboard enables the generation of performance-based immunization reports, defaulter reports, population-based coverage reports, and more. Vaccinator Management: Facilitates tracking and attendance of vaccinators, micro-planning, surveillance forms, and vaccine stock maintenance. Offline Functionality: The application also works offline after a successful offline sync completion, ensuring uninterrupted service even without internet connectivity. PDF Reports: Allows vaccinators to download PDF reports for easy access and distribution. Attendance Tracking: Monitors the attendance of vaccinators, ensuring accountability and efficiency. SMS Reminders: Automatically sends reminders to parents about upcoming immunization visits, improving adherence to vaccination schedules. NOTE: This application is exclusively for vaccinators and users of the EPI program with registered user accounts and credentials.
descriptionHTML:
The Federal Directorate of Immunization (FDI) - National Electronic Immunization Registry (NEIR) is an Android-based application designed to revolutionize vaccination data management and support public health initiatives. This application empowers healthcare professionals to register and record child vaccination data in real time using unique Quick Response (QR) codes. NEIR ensures a server-based, persistent electronic record that facilitates precise tracking of child vaccination coverage and supports disease prevention efforts.

Clinical decision support
The app includes an electronic decision support system that guides routine and catch-up immunizations, enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of vaccination efforts.

Disease prevention and public health
The app supports national immunization campaigns and tracks child vaccination data in real-time using unique QR codes. It maintains comprehensive vaccination records and facilitates precise tracking of child vaccination coverage.

Healthcare services and management:
The app facilitates vaccinator management, attendance tracking, micro-planning, surveillance forms, and vaccine stock maintenance. It also provides comprehensive reporting, PDF report downloads, and SMS reminders for upcoming immunization visits.

Key features of FDI NEIR include:
Immunization Campaign and Data Support: Supports national immunization campaigns and data management strategies by maintaining comprehensive vaccination records and providing decision support to health workers.
Real-time Data Recording: Allows vaccinators to instantly log vaccination data against unique QR codes, ensuring accurate and up-to-date records.
Electronic Decision Support System: Guides routine and catch-up immunizations, enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of vaccination efforts.
Comprehensive Reporting:The web-based dashboard enables the generation of performance-based immunization reports, defaulter reports, population-based coverage reports, and more.
Vaccinator Management: Facilitates tracking and attendance of vaccinators, micro-planning, surveillance forms, and vaccine stock maintenance.
Offline Functionality: The application also works offline after a successful offline sync completion, ensuring uninterrupted service even without internet connectivity.
PDF Reports: Allows vaccinators to download PDF reports for easy access and distribution.
Attendance Tracking: Monitors the attendance of vaccinators, ensuring accountability and efficiency.
SMS Reminders: Automatically sends reminders to parents about upcoming immunization visits, improving adherence to vaccination schedules.

NOTE: This application is exclusively for vaccinators and users of the EPI program with registered user accounts and credentials.
summary: FDI NEIR - National Electronic Immunization Registry (NEIR) Mobile Application
